file_content.text: We've got bad news...
Six Alliance patrols. Four outposts. All destroyed by the Eternal Fleet in the last hour.
There can be only one reason: Vaylin's regained control of the GEMINI droids.
She may have the fleet, but I have the key to her conditioning. It's only a matter of time before I defeat the empress.
Her powers remain shackled.
She's entrenched in the Spire. Even with her conditioning, she remains a significant threat.
I found someone who can help. An inside man on Zakuul.
I saw the fleet holovids. Ghastly business. I apologize on behalf of my people.
And you are?
Indo Zal, Magistrate of Revelry and attendant to Empress Vaylin.
She's a plague on the good people of Zakuul. But if we work together, we can remove her from power and end this blasted war.
You record that, Lana?
Lana, make sure he stays loyal.
Every treasonous word.
Consider it insurance. If you even think of betraying us, we send proof of your treachery to Vaylin.
Don't worry. Indo's clean.
But eager to get my hands dirty! Vaylin is throwing a party on Zakuul to celebrate her glory.
The guest list is exclusive, but I'll secure invitations, disguises--everything you need to infiltrate the party and overthrow the empress.
Vaylin will be too busy celebrating to see the target on her forehead.
It'll be an easy kill.
Even if we avoid detection, we'd need an army to penetrate her defenses.
And an army you'll have. During the party, Vaylin plans to execute my dear friends: a host of Zakuulan rebels.
Save the rebels, and they will help dethrone the empress.
Your rebel friends better be ready to die for their cause. I won't tolerate cowardice.
I expect total commitment.
They stand ready to fight on the battlefield of freedom.
This could work. Teeseven and I can slice into the security grid.
And I'll help you get close enough to trigger Vaylin's conditioning.
How exciting! I take it Operation Dragon's Maw is a go?
Make the arrangements. If there's even one slip-up, I'll see that you pay.
Do not fail me.
You have nothing to fear, Outlander. I have a reputation to uphold--and a home to liberate!
Everyone gear up. In one hour, we infiltrate Zakuul--and crash Vaylin's party.
Then we take the fight to Vaylin. Remove her from power before she tears the galaxy apart.
We need to take action.
We can't simply launch an attack on the heart of the empire.
Double crossing Vaylin is no small risk. We'll make sure you're protected.
You were right to come to us.
Esne's eyes, you're as noble as they say.
Have we confirmed this isn't a trap?
Vaylin can sense my presence. We'll need a distraction if we want to get close.
Vaylin will know I'm there.
Distractions are my specialty. And your party crash is my magnum opus.
An enemy of Vaylin is a friend of mine. I'll do whatever I can to ensure their safety.
The Alliance welcomes them.
I knew I was right to cast my lot with you.
Welcome to the Alliance, Indo.
You're one of us now.
That gave me tingles. I'll make preparations straight away. Let's free an empire!
SCORPIO's gone, but we still have GEMINI Prime. Could we use her to release the droids?
Maybe GEMINI Prime can help.
GEMINI Prime = nonresponsive // Attempts to revive = unsuccessful
A nice sentiment, but how do I know you're telling the truth?
I'd like to believe you.
Indo = helped T7 infiltrate Spire // T7 + Indo = good team!
That party will be full of civilians. I won't risk catching them in the crossfire.
We can't endanger the guests.
They may be rebels, but to them I'm still the Outlander. Are you sure they'll follow me?
Zakuulans may not trust me.
My friends are fully committed. You're the best chance we've got.
Tell me that's not really the name of the mission.
Operation Dragon's Maw?
Never do anything unless you do it in style. Let's liberate an empire, shall we?
Your lovely little droid can vouch for me.
If all goes according to plan, you'll have nothing to worry about.
If SCORPIO freed the GEMINIs once, she may help us do it again. Can we contact her?
SCORPIO may be able to help.
Get me through the door, and I'll make Vaylin herself believe I'm the guest of honor.
Infiltration is my specialty.
Iokath = massive radiation zone // Every transmission attempt = failed
Our only option is to remove Vaylin from power, but she's nearly untouchable on the Spire.
Six Alliance patrols. Four outposts. One supply convoy from the Sith Empire. All destroyed by the Eternal Fleet in the last hour.
